member.summary: Defines members that an object must implement in order to have paging functionality provided by the MvcPager control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current page index.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.IPagedList.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of data items that are displayed for each page of data.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.IPagedList.TotalItemCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of data items that are available for paging.

member.name: T:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.IPagedList`1
member.summary: Defines members that an object must implement in order to have paging functionality provided by the MvcPager control.

member.name: T:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptions
member.summary: Represents option settings for running Ajax scripts for the MvcPager control, this class inherits from AjaxOptions.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptions.EnablePartialLoading
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether partial page loading is enabled.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptions.DataFormId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the form element that values of fields should be passed to server by MvcPager every time page changed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptions.AllowCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client cache is allowed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptions.EnableHistorySupport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating browser history support is enabled by adding hash(#) to url.

member.name: T:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder
member.summary: Represents a MvcAjaxOptions builder that is used to create the MvcAjaxOptions object.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.#ctor(Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder class with a MvcAjaxOptions instance.
member.param: A MvcAjaxOptions instance contains option settings for running Ajax scripts for the MvcPager control.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetUpdateTargetId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets sets the ID of the DOM element to update by using the response from the server, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.UpdateTargetId to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetHttpMethod(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the HTTP request method ("Get" or "Post"), it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.HttpMethod to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetOnBegin(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the name of the JavaScript function to call immediately before the page is updated, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnBegin to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetOnSuccess(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the JavaScript function to call after the page is successfully updated, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnSuccess to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetOnComplete(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the JavaScript function to call when response data has been instantiated but before the page is updated, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnComplete to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetOnFailure(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the JavaScript function to call if the page update fails, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnFailure to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetLoadingElementId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the id attribute of an HTML element that is displayed while the Ajax function is loading, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.LoadingElementId to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetLoadingElementDuration(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a value, in milliseconds, that controls the duration of the animation when showing or hiding the loading element, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.LoadingElementDuration to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetConfirm(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the message to display in a confirmation window before a request is submitted, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.Confirm to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.EnablePartialLoading
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether partial page loading is enabled, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.EnablePartialLoading to true.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.SetDataFormId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ID of the form element that values of fields should be passed to server by MvcPager every time page changed, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.DataFormId to the given value.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.DisallowCache
member.summary: Disables the client cache, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.AllowCache to false.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder.DisableHistorySupport
member.summary: Disables the browser history support, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.EnableHistorySupport to false.

member.name: T:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.AjaxPager
member.summary: Returns an HTML container element with Ajax data attributes that contains a list of hyperlinks and text for providing paging functionality to the giver data.

Current page index.

member.summary: Renders AjaxPager to HTML encoded string for display on the page.

member.name: T:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions
member.summary: Represents option settings for MvcPager.

member.name: M:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagerOptions class with default property values.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.ActionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the action method.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.ControllerName
member.summary: The name of the controller class.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.RouteName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the route that is used to generate paging urls.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.RouteValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains the parameters for the route used by MvcPager.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains the HTML attributes to set for the MvcPager.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.FirstPageRouteName
member.summary: Gets or sets the route name for the generation of the first page url.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.AutoHide
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether MvcPager should be hidden if there's only one page of data.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.PageIndexOutOfRangeErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message to be displayed when page index is oute of range (less than 1 or larger than total pages count).

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.InvalidPageIndexErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message to be displayed when page index is invalid (not a valid integer).

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.PageIndexParameterName
member.summary: Gets or sets the page index parameter name in the current route.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.PageIndexBoxId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the page index box (must be textbox or dropdownlist).

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.GoToButtonId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id value of the go to button for the page index box, if this property value is not set, pagechanged event will be fired after value of the pager index box is changed(fired by javascript onchange event).

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.MaximumPageIndexItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of page indices to be displayed within page index dropdownlist, this property value has no effect if page index box is a textbox,

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.PageNumberFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string for all numeric pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.CurrentPageNumberFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string for the current page number.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.ContainerTagName
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML tag name for the container element of the pager.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.PagerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to all pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.NumericPagerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the html template for the numeric pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.CurrentPagerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the current page pager item.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.NavigationPagerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the first, previous, next and last page pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.MorePagerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the more pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.DisabledPagerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the disabled pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.AlwaysShowFirstLastPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first and the last numeric pager items should be displayed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.NumericPagerItemCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of the numeric pager items to be displayed.

Property.name: ShowPrevNext
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the previous page and the next page pager items should be displayed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.PrevPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page pager item.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.NextPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page pager item.

Property.name: ShowNumericPagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the numeric pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ShowFirstLast
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first and last paging buttons are displayed.

Property.name: ShowFirstLast
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first page and the last page pager items should be displayed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.FirstPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the first page button.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.LastPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the last page pager item.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.ShowMorePagerItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the more pager items should be displayed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.MorePageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the more pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the top DOM element that is the container of all pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.HorizontalAlign
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a MvcPager on the page.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to container element of the pager.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.ShowDisabledPagerItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the disabled pager items should be displayed.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.MaximumPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum page number limitation, default value is 0, which means maximum page number is calculated from the data to be paged.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.HidePagerItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether MvcPager should be hidden (in case you need to create your own pager UI).

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.NavigationPagerItemsPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the first, previous, next and last pager items.

member.name: P:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.PagerOptions.OnPageIndexError
member.summary: Gets or sets the Javascript function to call when page index errors occured.

member.name: T:Webdiyer.WebControls.Mvc.ScriptResourceExtensions
member.summary: This class contains two extension methods: HtmlHelper.RegisterMvcPagerScriptResource method is used to register the MvcPager jQuery plugin, and AjaxHelper.LoadMvcPagerScript method is used to dynamically load the MvcPager jQuery plugin, two methods can not be used at the same time.
